name: Magi-Kart
description:
Gameplay:

(plug in an xbox controller for player two)
Player One (Keyboard):
Left key and Right key to turn car
Press and hold Up key to increase speed, let go of Up key to decrease speed
Press and hold Down key to reverse
Press Shift to fire selected weapon
Press Ctrl to swap selected and unselected weapons with each other
Player Two (Controller):
Move left joystick left and right to turn car
Press and hold Right Trigger to increase speed, let go of Right Trigger to decrease speed
Press and hold B to reverse
Press X to fire selected weapon
Press Y to swap selected and unselected weapons with each other
MENU:
left Joystick or Left Key and Right key to move menu selection left and right
A or Spacebar to select

If at any time you want to go back to the menu during a game just press Esc

How to play:
The aim of the game is to be the last man (or woman) standing!  Pick up chests to get a weapon.
Any weapons in your inventory are displayed at the top corners (left for player one, right for player two).
Press your swap weapon button to swap the bigger icon with the smaller icon - the bigger icon is the weapon
you will use when you press the fire button.  
The Icons are as follows: Bubble = shield, Red arrow = laser, music disc = triple usable projectile,
Jar = peanut butter blob, three blue arrows = Speed Boost, nut/seed = seed bomb, red doughnut = ground pound.
Players lives are displayed in the bottom corner under each players weapons.
If the player dies (single player) or both players die (two player) you automatically go back to the menu.

I was helped while making this game by my friends, Matt, Ben, and Ethan, all of witch did art for the game
